productName: RENPHO Body Fat Scale Smart BMI Scale Digital Bathroom Wireless Weight Scale, Body Composition Analyzer with Smartphone App sync with Bluetooth, 396 lbs - Black, Elis 1
productDetails: Brand: RENPHO, Colour: Black, Special features: Body Fat, Muscle Mass, Bodyweight, Weight limit: 396 Pounds, Material: Glass, Item weight: 1.25 Kilograms, Manufacturer: RENPHO, Unit count: 1 Count, UPC: 768390264852 768390265019 601549422355, Global Trade Identification Number: 00768390264852, 04897122200014

reviews.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars An easy to use, digital weighing scale
reviews.body:
Renpho is a well-designed weighing scale which comes with its own App. The manufacturer had also included 2 Double-A batteries, so the scale could be used right out of the box.
Once you‚Äôve downloaded the Renpho App, it‚Äôs easy to pair it with your smart phone.
Just turn on your Bluetooth, click on the ‚Äúpaired device‚Äù, step on the scale and you‚Äôll receive important information about your body muscle, visceral fat and BMI all on 1 easy-to-read page.
I also liked the fact that the Renpho weighing scale could pair with multiple users, so my other family members could also use this scale and chart their weight trend. All they had to go was download the Renpho App onto their own phones and repeat the initial syncing steps like I did and they get their own readings.
Pro-Tip: scan the QR code to download the Renpho App. Otherwise, if you searched by name, you might download the wrong Renpho App as there were a few Apps with similar names.

reviews.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing product, really well made.
reviews.body: Value for money, use every day! App works really well too. thanks !! :)

reviews.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Product
reviews.body: Easy to use. Download app and it's ready to use. If you don't download app you are unable to change the units of measure (Kg/lbs) and there is no physical button to click like the older models have. Highly recommended product. Thanks.

reviews.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Take the body composition metrics with pinch of salt.
reviews.body: The scale is stable and has a nice look to it. I like that it shoes up to 2 decimal points for more accuracy. I cant say much for the accuracy of the body composition metrics. It can fluctuate very wildly from one day to the next. I use it mainly as a weight scale and nothing else. Its nice having the extra features but take it with pinch of salt and just as something fun to take a look at and play with.

reviews.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars This body fat & BMI weighing scale is awesome !!!!
reviews.body: It encourages you to workout to lose weight !! Because it shows you the improvements in your visceral and subcutaneous fat, BMI, etc.

reviews.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use and lots of health parameters
reviews.body: It was very easy to set it up. Took less than a minute. The app is good as well. Not sure how accurate the parameters are but its not bad to use as a rough reference level to track progress.

reviews.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product
reviews.body: Useful for me to track my body weight and other things.

reviews.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty good considering the price
reviews.body: I don't know how accurate this is, but it seems to work fine. Just step on it, let it calibrate, and then install the Renpho app on my mobile as I stand on it for 10-15 seconds. Tracking the measurements over the course of 2 weeks seemed to be pretty consistent so I'm happy with that. There's an athletic mode too for people like me who exercise 4-5 days a week, and it shows all kinds of data on the app, so that's kinda neat. Also, I got it on sale for 25 bucks so it's pretty cheap considering what it does. If you need a cheap scale that does its job reasonably well, then yeah I'd recommend this scale 100%. Although I'm not so sure this scale gives off 100% accurate body fat % and muscle mass numbers, the key thing is that it tracks your fat/loss gain over time consistently, so I can really see my fat% going down if I hit my macros/exercises right, and it going up along with 0.2-0.3 muscle mass loss when I skip my exercises for a few days.

reviews.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simple to use !
reviews.body: Simple n elegant n easy to use!

reviews.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Does its job
reviews.body: Prob not the most accurate other than the weight itself but good intuitive app

reviews.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great scale
reviews.body: Easy to setup and use

reviews.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Connects to my iPhone!
reviews.body: Love how functional it is!!

reviews.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Scale is pretty good!
reviews.body: I like the app and the way it actually tells you fat percentile and visceral fats when synced to this scale. Affordable and advanced!

reviews.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fantastic Buy!
reviews.body:
Discovered this while researching for a digital scale. While skeptical initially, I have come to discover it is sturdy, looks to be well put together and does what it claims.

It arrived within 72 hours of order placement (fast!), was well packed and in my opinion is completely worth its value. Would highly recommend it!

reviews.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Reliable
reviews.body: Reliable, accurate, easy to setup

reviews.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Passed Expectation
reviews.body: Needed some scales and once I‚Äôd downloaded the app it has been so simple and such an incentive to keep a lid on things!

reviews.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality product
reviews.body:
Renpho weighing scale along with its companion app is the best solution if you want to track your weight. Weighing scale is solid built, app integration is seamless. No complaints.

App integrates with Google fit, Samsung Health, Fit Bit so any changes to your weight can flow to other devices without any effort.

Most of all, rightly priced unlike other brands which cost close to $100 with similar integration. Thanks Ranpho.

reviews.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Serve it's purpose well.
reviews.body:
The scale is good and able to records weight, body fat and other data for my whole family.
Also able to link to my Fitbit app.
Definitely a good purchase.

reviews.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Useful despite the limitations
reviews.body: Great for keeping track of helpful parameters such as fat percentage. I use it everyday. However, I am skeptical of the accuracy of certain parameters. Body fat percentage and muscle mass can change by 0.3% after meals. I understand for weight, but I doubt fat and muscle changes that drastically! It's best to weigh at fixed times of day, just as for any other balance.

reviews.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Totally imprecise and useless to calculate body composition
reviews.body: if you use it a normal scale, nothing to complain. If you expect to really and truly measure your visceral and subcutaneus fat, it is totally wrong. Prove is if you take your weight across only a couple of days and your overall weight is increased because of eating or water ritention, the scale will reveal your fat is increased as it is increased your weight. It is impossible that 2 measurements taken 2 days away can report an increase of fat of the same amount of weight increase. This scale is utterly imprecise and overall useless for calculating body composition. If you want real screening you need to use a much more expensive and reliable equipment, not this.

reviews.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it
reviews.body:
Love it and hope it doesn‚Äôt spoils that easily
Able to have multiple users on the app. Easy to sync.

Only downside of the app is that u have to tap out to see another day‚Äôs measurement instead of comparing previous day‚Äôs data by swiping left or right. That‚Äôs the app issue not the machine. Machine is basically perfect

reviews.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Weighing scale
reviews.body: Accurate scale. Nicely packed. Recommended buy

reviews.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Loving it!
reviews.body: I didn‚Äôt expect much for the price paid! However, it exceeded my expectations! The product looks classy and the reading is complex (thought unsure if the scale measurement is accurate or not).

reviews.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars A good buy
reviews.body: Family enjoys it. It works well.

reviews.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect, very easy to use and syncs perfectly with their App on my iPhone
reviews.body:
Nice size, 30 cm x 30 cm. A genuine product, exactly as described.
I avoid the 26cm x 26 cm scales, as they tend to be physically unstable once one stands on them.
What was great was the interface with their easily downloadable App which also had clear instructions on how to sync it with the Scale.
The red LED display is very easy to read, under any light conditions.
LCD displays on some machines can sometimes be difficult to read under very bright conditions.

reviews.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice scale, easy to use and looks great
reviews.body:
This scale give a lot of reading to help us know our health at one glance. The apps is easy to navigate and the scale itself is looking great.
I am happy with my purchase.

reviews.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Most reliable body composition
reviews.body: After taking measurements so far I am satisfied with the results üòå it's almost similar to EVOLT+ weighing machine. Reasonable price and reliable productüëå thanks seller üòÉüëç

reviews.body: Syncs well with Samsung health

reviews.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use and convenience
reviews.body: The weighing machine is easy to use and convenience. The weight and body mass is recorded in phone immediately.

reviews.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Weight tracking is good, all the other metrics are off
reviews.body: I got this scale just to measure my weight. It has a tonne of other statistics in the app, but I wouldn't say any of them are remotely accurate or precise. But the app is helpful for tracking weight over time.

reviews.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good product
reviews.body: So happy I bought this scale . It‚Äôs cheap , accurate & tells u a whole of stuff .

reviews.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Works well for price paid
reviews.body: For $35, it works well as advertised, but compared to my previous Fitbit scale, it is much smaller and lighter, hence will bounce off the floor when stepping off the scale. For the price paid, can't complain

reviews.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good scale
reviews.body: The set of data provided by the scale has made me start some healthy lifestyle changes

reviews.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not sure the accuracy
reviews.body:
I'm just not sure how is the accuracy. Previously I used Xiaomi body composition 2.
I try this due to very high rating, good price after discount and best seller in amazon.
Compare to xiaomi, this is lighter and smaller, display numbers not as big and not that clear / bright.
My body composition looks better e.g lesser body fats 2-3% with rephno :-D

reviews.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Functional and working
reviews.body: Pairs well with bluetooth app. Works fine giving estimate bodily readings.

reviews.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than i expected!
reviews.body: I read good reviews on Reddit of this scale. It syncs via bluetooth to an app. It‚Äôs much more thorough than i expected and it‚Äôs very interesting to see all my stats. It let‚Äôs you set body fat % and body weight goals. It can also weigh the muscle in your body as well as the fat which is cool! Definitely recommend this scale if you‚Äôre looking for one!

reviews.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use
reviews.body: It was quite easy to connect to my phone. Love using it!

reviews.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars App Difficult - Clumsy
reviews.body:
Provides the measurements but not convinced accurate.

The App is difficult to use, the first readings show only weight and only by reading further instruction did I work out what to do next. Not intuitive and difficult to store data each day.

Scale 4 star
App 2 star hence the overall 3 star rating

reviews.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works accurately and is easy to use
reviews.body: Works accurately and is easy to use

reviews.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to sync with your phone!
reviews.body: Best digital scale I've found so far. If you want to measure all your stats (body fat %, water weight, muscle mass, BMI, etc) in addition to weight, this is a great scale for monitoring yourself. I'm not sure if it works for multiple people, but it's great for tracking individual progress.

reviews.body: Easy to use and app super friendly

reviews.body: It worked as advertised and it is very informative with all of the details on the app.

reviews.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars The App is not pairing up/connecting to phone bluetooth at all.
reviews.body: It was difficult to pair the scale to the App on my phone. I contacted customer care, but they were not helpful. I've followed all the instructions, but the machine is still not working.

reviews.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Inaccurate measurement
reviews.body: Inaccurate measurement. Delta increases with higher weight.

reviews.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Renpho scale
reviews.body: The app and the device work very easily and I have 6 to 7 different devices using the same scale. It works like a charm. Just make sure that there is only 1 device actively linked or connected to the scale at any one time. The information appears to be quite accurate and easy to understand.

reviews.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Value for Money
reviews.body: Works well and so far okay.

reviews.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value
reviews.body: Provided a range of useful information, easy to set up and use on the iPhone. Have not compared results to other machines but for our purpose - fitness and health tracking at home - it definitely exceeded expectations.

reviews.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Ease of use and Sync to Fitbit.
reviews.body: Easy to use and able to sync to Fitbit.

reviews.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality at a good price

reviews.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simple and Easy To Use
reviews.body: The app is pretty simple to use after syncing with the weighing scale. I like the fact that when I step up on the weighing scale, the app will automatically record the measurements. The price of the product is reasonable and functions are useful. Highly recommended.

reviews.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty good
reviews.body:
syncs and performs as intended. However I'm not very sure how accurate the metrics other than weight are.

they all move in the same line so I am wondering if it's just formulas based on weight/height.

reliable measures and tracks weight which is what I purchased the item for though.

reviews.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Simple and compact
reviews.body: Would be nice to show the bmi and body fat from the machine as well. U need to check for the app.

reviews.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very useful with the app, to see trends and work towards a goal.
reviews.body: The fact that it works and syncs with the app and helps you track and monitor your data helps a lot.

reviews.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good looking & easy to use
reviews.body: Just as a weighing scale should be, it is easy to use and read the numbers off the dial. The app provides a bit more information - but to me, its accuracy/relevance is a bit doubtful - how could they determine all that information by simply standing on 4 electrodes. Nevertheless, the scale does what it says it does.

reviews.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good product

reviews.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best smart scale available for the price.
reviews.body:
This is an amazing scale. We connected to iphones via Bluetooth. We all use to measure the fat content, bmi, bone mass etc. One of the best value for money smart scales. I would approx 0.5% off on industrial machines but close enough for home use. The app is very nice and easy to use.
Thank so much Renpho.

reviews.body: Not sure if it is accurate but it's good enough if use as benchmark of your own in general. It stopped connecting to my phone after a few days so I'm using it with my tablet now.

reviews.body: Have used it for more than a month now. Easier connection and good quality item. It even came with batteries ! Bravo seller ! Thank you. A great transaction experience !

reviews.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars It's great
reviews.body: Bluetooth syncing works great across the apps (including FitBit). It tracks quite a bit (more than just weight) - hope it is accurate. The ability to see trends is also helpful.

reviews.body: Very easy to set up and can use with all members of the family. The app is also quite intuitive and integrates well with iOS.

reviews.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So far so good!
reviews.body: The results are near accurate I would say. I‚Äôve tried other brands before and the fat percentage were way off! I‚Äôm satsified with this buy. Scale is also light and app is fantastic!

reviews.body: It's a wonderful Body smart scale that can connect to the Renpho app & show weight, BMI, Body Fat, Body Water, Bone Mass, Protein, BMR, Skeletal Muscle, etc.. Wondering whether how accurate are these parameters??

reviews.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Readings not accurate, keep fluctuating even after calibrated. Not worth the price
reviews.body:
While the smart digital scales+body composition is a good add-on, the weight scale measurement reading is the most important and has to be accurate.

I am very unhappy and angry that the weighing scale reading is consistently "inconsistent" even after calibrated (zero-ing), the differences between 2 readings can range from 1-3 kgs. It causes alot of mental confusion as to which is the "real" readings, and wasted alot of time figuring out everyday. Imaging the readings delta difference for every time you stand on it.

I end up have to buy another weighing scale, to ensure that the weights taken by RENPHO is correct. i feel stupid.

Not worth the expensive price tag.
